text: Jesper Borgen (born 21 September 1988) is a Warner/Chappell Music published Norwegian songwriter and producer, active in Norway and other countries around the world. In 2015, he won the TONO award for "songwriter of the year 2014" in Norway, based on his large catalogue and big variety of songs and genres. He has been involved in both writing and producing the song "Faded" with artist Alan Walker, which became a worldwide hit with over five million single sales. He was also a part of making the successful follow up single for Walker, "Sing Me to Sleep". Jesper Borgen has written, collaborated with, and produced for artist like Bebe Rexha, Steve Aoki, Felix Jaehn, Seeb, Girls Generation, Christopher, Victon, and Tove Styrke. Jesper Borgen has currently had number 1 singles in 19 countries. ==Tracks== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Title !!
